title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A personal finance tracking application that helps users monitor expenses and receive data-driven savings recommendations. Built with ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, and Docker, and deployed on AWS. Key Features: Tracks 100+ unique monthly expenses,Provides data-driven savings recommendations,Achieved an average 20% increase in user savings

title: Emotion-Analyzing Diary App
description: A mobile diary application that uses sentiment analysis models (BERT, GPT) to assess usersâ€™ emotional states in real time. It provides users with personalized motivational content based on their emotional tone, helping to enhance self-awareness and mental well-being.

title: Stock Price Forecasting with Deep Learning
description: Developed a deep learning-based stock price forecasting model using TensorFlow and Keras, leveraging time series analysis to capture market trends and improve predictive accuracy.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and experience. Built with React, it features a responsive design, smooth animations, and an optimized user experience. Includes sections for about, experience, projects, blog, and contact, with seamless navigation and interactive UI elements.

title: Spring Boot CRUD API
description: A basic Spring Boot project implementing CRUD operations for task management. The application allows creating, updating, deleting, and assigning tasks to users while managing user data efficiently.

title: Image to Text Converter
description: A cross-platform mobile application that converts images to text using Optical Character Recognition (OCR). Developed using Flutter (Dart) for a seamless experience across Android and iOS, with a web version available.
